{{ hugo.Generator }} {{ with .Title }}{{ . }} | {{ end }}{{ .Site.Title }} {{- $style := resources.Get "css/theme.scss" | resources.ToCSS (dict "includePaths" (slice "node_modules")) | resources.Minify | resources.Fingerprint }} {{- $scratch := newScratch }} {{- $scratch.Set "description" (or .Description (.Param "description")) }} {{- $scratch.Set "keywords" (delimit (or .Keywords (.Param "keywords")) ",") }} {{- with .Site.Params.title }} {{- end }}
